subject: Alpine Skiing
Divorce, Separations and Annulments
Skiing
lead_paragraph: The ski racer Lindsey Vonn and her husband, Thomas, who also coached her, each filed for divorce last week. They have been married four years.
snippet: The ski racer Lindsey Vonn and her husband, Thomas, who also coached her, each filed for divorce last week. They have been married four years.
